lead_paragraph: MELLER--Michael N.,well-known international patent attorney, died on Sunday, July 3, 2016 in New London, NH. He is survived by his wife Elizabeth, three children and three grandchildren. A memorial service is planned for the fall. To sign the online guest book please visit www.chadwickfuneral service.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MELLER, MICHAEL N.
